name: shaarli
description: Shaarli is a self-hosted bookmark manager and link sharing application. It allows tagging, private or public links, and simple theming, providing a minimal alternative to online bookmarking services.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and tags

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize bookmarks with multiple tags for flexible organization

features.title: Public Or Private
features.description: Control visibility of individual bookmarks or entire collections

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Generates RSS feeds for sharing bookmarks with others or syncing to readers

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find bookmarks quickly by searching titles, descriptions, tags, or URLs

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other services via standard formats

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Format bookmark descriptions with markdown for rich text
